function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of sulfur hexafluoride as a tracer gas","Impact":"Potential exposure to sulfur hexafluoride","Mitigation":"Implement proper ventilation and safety measures","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, gas detectors","People":"Occupants and workers in the built environment","Owner":"Facility management and building operators"},{"Description":"Inconsistent handling of tracer cylinders between California and Virginia houses","Impact":"Risk of cylinder leakage and uncontrolled release of sulfur hexafluoride","Mitigation":"Develop standardized procedures for handling tracer cylinders","Technologies":"Safety protocols, tracking systems for cylinder usage","People":"Workers responsible for handling tracer cylinders","Owner":"Facility management and research team"}]}
